h1_title: How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss
h2_title: How to Summon the Shigandang Boss
content: The bad news is that the Shigandang will immediately turn on you, and is an incredibly formidable foe. If you are defeated, the Shigandang will return to its buried spot when you reawaken at the nearby Shrine, allowing you to summon it again when you're ready to go one on one, and freely explore the Rock Crash Platform beyond the arena without having to defeat the Shigandang.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Defeat_the_Stone_Vanguard_With_Another_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss', specifically from the subsection 'How to Summon the Shigandang Boss'.
The content is as follows:
The bad news is that the Shigandang will immediately turn on you, and is an incredibly formidable foe. If you are defeated, the Shigandang will return to its buried spot when you reawaken at the nearby Shrine, allowing you to summon it again when you're ready to go one on one, and freely explore the Rock Crash Platform beyond the arena without having to defeat the Shigandang.
